data.text:
West Ham Legends – In Conversation with Sir Trevor Brooking, Carlton Cole and Tony Gale.

Amassing more than 1000 appearances in the Claret & Blue of the Hammers between them, three West Ham legends are coming to town to talk about their action-packed football careers. Starring Sir Trevor Brooking, Carlton Cole & Tony Gale as they discuss the games, dressing room/training ground stories, managers, fall outs and everything you wanted to know about playing for a successful football club.

There will be a chance to pose questions to the stars during the evening.

A limited number of VIP tickets are available, affording the opportunity for a meet and greet with the legendary players and a photograph opportunity before the show.

Line-up subject to change
